titleStmt.title: The reformed spiritvall husbandman with an humble memorandum concerning Chelsy Colledge, and a correspondencie with forreign Protestants.
titleStmt.author: Dury, John, 1596-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Wodenothe, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
